thread.title: Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 Offers Affordable Lodging for Eye Opener Cross Country Meet
thread.title_full: Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 Offers Affordable Lodging for Eye Opener Cross Country Meet - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 Offers Affordable Lodging for Eye Opener Cross Country Meet
text:
Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 offers affordable lodging for the 32nd Annual Eye Opener Cross Country Meet in Spartanburg, SC on September 4-5, 2015.
 SPARTANBURG, SC, August 29, Current lodging specials include the Weekend Getaway Package with late check out. AAA and senior discounts are available. HHonors members will earn points toward free The Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 offers convenient and affordable lodging for the 32nd Annual Eye Opener Cross Country Meet in Spartanburg, South Carolina. College runners will compete on September 4, and high schoolers will run on September 5. The venue will be the Roger Milliken Arboretum at the Roger Milliken Center, one of the top cross country courses in the Southeast.
"We look forward to welcoming runners participating in the Eye Opener Cross Country Meet," comments Dawn Allison, General Manager at the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85. "Our Spartanburg SC hotel is just minutes from the Roger Milliken Center," explains Ms. Allison.
The award winning Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 features comfortable guest rooms with microwave, mini refrigerator, and free high speed Internet. Some rooms have whirlpool tubs. Guests will enjoy a restful night's sleep on Clean & Fresh Hampton Beds . Wake up each morning to Hampton's complimentary On the House Breakfast, with hot and cold favorites. Hampton On the Run Breakfast Bags are available on weekdays. The refreshing outdoor pool is the perfect place to relax after a busy day. Other hotel amenities include a business center, fitness center, and guest laundry. Nearby Upstate attractions include Croft State Park, BMW Zentrum, and the Premium Outlets at Gaffney. This Hampton Inn Spartanburg South Carolina hotel received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award for outstanding guest service.
The Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 is located at Exit 78.
For information about the 32nd Annual Eye Opener Cross Country Meet in Spartanburg, visit www.eyeopenercrosscountry.com . To book your stay at the nearby Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85, contact (864) 577-9080 or visit www.HamptonInnSpartanburg.com .
About Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85
This Spartanburg Hotel invites guests to step back in time to the colonial era or indulge in modern luxuries and recreation in Spartanburg, South Carolina. The Hampton Inn Spartanburg Hotel on North I-85 is situated to offer easy access of the Duncan business centers and is within five minutes of Wofford College. Guests can take a short drive into Greenville to see historic landmarks or enjoy world-class entertainment. This Spartanburg hotel offers a full range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional.
For more information visit http://www.HamptonInnSpartanburg.com
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
